column2: "Na n'ekyir no Moses nye Aaron bae
column3: na wɔbɛsee Farao dɛ
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column7: na wɔnkɛhyɛ fa mma me wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na Farao see dɛ
column3: Woana nye EWURADZE a mibetsie ne ndze na mama Israel akɔ? Minnyim EWURADZE
column4: na nkyii so meremma Israel nnkɔ."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hebriwfo Nyankopɔn nye hɛn ehyia: yɛpa wo kyɛw
column4: ma yɛnkɔ sar no do ndaansa kwan
column5: na yɛnkɔbɔ afɔr mma EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn; mma ɔaammfa ɔyardɔm

column2: "Na Egypthen no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Moses nye Aaron
column4: hom robɔ ɔman no ko wɔ hɔn ndwuma ho yi? Hom nkɔ hom ndzesoadze ho."

column2: "Na Farao see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: afei asaase no do nkorɔfo no adɔɔ so
column5: na hom ma wɔhom fi hɔn ndzesoadze ho yi."

column2: "Na da no ara Farao hyɛɛ ɔman no hɔn abɔmbaafo
column3: nye hɔn ahwɛdofo no dɛ
column5: "Mma hom mma ɔman no sar a wɔdze bɛyɛ ntayaa no bio dɛ nkan no: wɔmma hɔnara wɔnkɔ na wɔnkɔboaboa sar ano mma hɔnho."

column2: "Na ntayaa dodow a wɔyɛ no dada no
column3: hom ngye hɔn; mma hom nnyi do bi: na wɔyɛ enyihaw; dɛm ntsi na wosu dɛ
column4: Wɔmma yɛnkɔ nkɔbɔ afɔr mma hɛn Nyankopɔn no."

column2: "Hom mma edwuma durdur nda nkorɔfo no do
column3: ama wɔaayɛ mu edwuma aberɛ; na mma wonntsie nsɛnhun."

column2: "Na ɔman no hɔn abɔmbaafo
column3: nye hɔn ahwɛdofo no fiir edzi
column4: na wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no dɛ

column2: "Homara nkɔ nkɛfa sar wɔ mbrɛ hom benya bi: na worinnyi hom edwuma do biribiara."
"Nna ɔman no petsee Egypt asaase nyina do kɔboaboaa mburonan ano dze yɛɛ sar."
"Na abɔmbaafo no piapiaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nwie hom da kor edwuma wɔ ne da mu
column4: dɛ aber a sar wɔ hɔ no ara."

column2: "Na wɔhwee Israelmba ahwɛdofo no a Farao n'abɔmbaafo no dze hɔn esisi hɔn do no
column3: na wobisaa dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ennwie ntayaa a wɔahyɛ hom no yɛ ndeda nye ndɛ dɛ nkan no yi?"

column2: "Nna Israelmba ahwɛdofo no bae bosui tɔɔ Farao do dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na enye wo nkowaa dzi no dɛm yi?"

column2: "Wɔmmaa wo nkowaa sar
column3: na wɔse hɛn dɛ
column6: wɔahwe wo nkowaa dze; na wankasa wo man na wɔayɛ bɔn."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Enyiahafo nye hom
column4: enyiahafo nye hom: dɛm ntsi na hom se dɛ
column5: Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔbɔ afɔr mma EWURADZE a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nkɔ nkɛyɛ edwuma; na sar dze wɔremma hom
column3: naaso ntayaa no dodow dze hom mma."

column2: "Na Israelmba ahwɛdofo no hun dɛ wɔwɔ amandzenya mu wɔ aber a wɔkaa dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnyi hom da kor edwuma mu ntayaa no do dabiarada no."

column2: "Na wofi Farao nkyɛn reba no
column3: wɔbɔtoo Moses nye Aaron dɛ wogyina ɔkwan no mu hɔ:"

column2: "na wɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nhwɛ hom
column4: na ombua; dɛ hom ama hɛn ho abɔn wɔ Farao
column6: na hom dze afona ahyɛ hɔn nsa dɛ wɔmfa nku hɛn ntsi."

column2: "Na Moses sanee kɔr EWURADZE nkyɛn kɛsee dɛ
column3: EWURADZE
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na enye ɔman yi edzi no bɔn dɛm yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na esomaa me yi?"

column2: "Na ofitsi aber ara a mebaa Farao nkyɛn dɛ medze wo dzin nye no kasae no
column3: ɔayɛ ɔman yi bɔn; nkyii so enngyee wo man koraa."
